SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_UPDATE_RG_STARTDATE_FIX
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_UPDATE_RG_STARTDATE_FIX as begin
begin try update rs set STARTDATE = u.FIRSTINSTALLMENTDATE -- '2012-11-30' from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rs join FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.ID join dbo.USR_REVENUESCHEDULE_BEFORE_STARTDATE_UPDATE u on u.RGID = ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID; end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
end
